short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Price Per Unit Comparator for Walmart Shopping

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Price Per Unit Comparator for Walmart Shopping is a powerful tool designed to help you make informed purchasing decisions. This extension calculates the price per unit (e.g., per kilogram, liter, or piece) for products on Walmartâ€™s website, allowing you to easily compare which item offers the best value for your money.

In addition to comparing prices, the extension provides a color-coded sorting feature, where products are highlighted based on their price efficiency. This color map helps you quickly identify the most cost-effective options at a glance.

Please note that this extension is not affiliated with or endorsed by Walmart Inc. Walmart is a trademark of Walmart Inc.
